name: Anti Virus (DankNStein)
description:
I made this game in a week. I thought I would put my skills to the test and join the Indie Beginners Game Jam and attempt to finish something half decent in just 7 days. 

The theme was Robots, and somehow I ended up here, with a game called Anti Virus.

Grow your team of robots who will provide you with CPU power for.... you guessed it, more robots. When a virus strikes use your CPU power reserves to zap the infected robots away before the virus spreads!

12 Games in 12 Months: 2/12

DankNStein Games #003
